snippet: The showdown was a test case in American labor relations, partly because Caterpillar was driving such a hard bargain when its business was thriving.
abstract: Workers striking at a Caterpillar hydraulic parts factory in Joliet, Ill, vote to ratify a proposed six-year contract that contains almost all of the concessions the company had demanded; showdown was a test case in American labor relations, partly because Caterpillar was driving such a hard bargain when its business was thriving.
lead_paragraph: The showdown was a test case in American labor relations, partly because Caterpillar was driving such a hard bargain when its business was thriving.

headline.seo: Striking Caterpillar Workers Ratify Contract Offer
headline.main: Caterpillar Workers Ratify Deal They Dislike
headline.print_headline: Caterpillar Workers Ratify Deal They Dislike
